alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 5:43AM CST until December 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches and possible local amounts up to four inches. * WHERE...Bayfield, Ashland and Sawyer Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation, the Bad River Reservation and the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and potentially limited visibility on roadways for the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
